title: Facebook : number of followers of popular beauty brands 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand fans in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Brand fans in millions 9.8 is found at Month Bath & Body Works and the minimum is found at Embelleze where Month is 4.01.
The difference of Brand fans in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.79.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Brand fans in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Brand fans in millions 9.8 is found at Month Bath & Body Works and the minimum is found at Embelleze where Month is 4.01.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand fans in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Brand fans in millions 9.8 is found at Month Bath & Body Works and the minimum is found at Embelleze where Month is 4.01.
The difference of Brand fans in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.79.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand fans in millions for 10 number of Months.
The Brand fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Bath & Body Works and lowest at Month Embelleze.
Month Risqué has the second highest value for Brand fans in millions.
The difference of Brand fans in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.79.
Month Bath & Body Works is higher than any other Months with value 9.8, followed by Risqué, and Mary Kay Brasil. Down to Month Embelleze with the lowest value 4.01.
Over the past 10 Months, the Brand fans in millions has lowered.
Considered together, the average Brand fans in millions in all 10 Months is roughly 5.64.
The Brand fans in millions is 56.38 if we add up values of all Months.
